overview: Marina is a young actress in the middle of a preparation process for a character called Luísa, a timid boom operator, who finds herself intrigued by her neighbor, Marina, a young actress in the middle of a preparation process for a character called Luísa, who can't really tell what is real and what is not.
tagline: A microphone, an actress, a flying priest and a wall that each day gets thinner and thinner.
title: Hammer, Anvil, Stapes
